item.title:
R to @dcjarvis: Discovery, Build, Ship, Measure.
No need for too much planning.
item.dc:creator: @lylo
item.description:
Discovery, Build, Ship, Measure.

No need for too much planning.

item.title:
RT by @lylo: Companies spend way too much time planning.
Hoping that a buttoned up detailed plan will help them ship more. They hire professional planners vs builders. More planning happens.
My suggestion… focus on consistent progress by building vs trying too hard to guess the future.
item.dc:creator: @jmwind
item.description:
Companies spend way too much time planning.

Hoping that a buttoned up detailed plan will help them ship more. They hire professional planners vs builders. More planning happens.

My suggestion… focus on consistent progress by building vs trying too hard to guess the future.

item.title: “Your job as a leader is not to make the hard calls. That’s ego talking. Your job as a leader is to clearly explain how you made the hard call so your team understands how you think, what strategy you are employing, and what principles you are following.” https://randsinrepose.com/archives/by-design/
item.dc:creator: @lylo
